>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/cm/v2/product/commerce/{IDCommerce}/product/{IDProduct}/sku/"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



crea un sku del producto

  id={"request"}

          schema={{"pattern":"/^[0-9a-zA-Z-]+$/","type":"string","description":"stock keeping unit o SKU, 'unidad de mantenimiento en almacén', este sku debe ser único para el comercio"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"universal_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** Value must match regular expression `/^[0-9]+$/`"}
          schema={{"pattern":"/^[0-9]+$/","type":"string","description":"identificador universal del producto\nDebería ser unico para el comercio\nEste parametro es obligatorio"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"universal_id_type"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"UniversalIdType (string)"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ean-8`, `upc-12`, `upc-8`, `gtin-14`, `isbn-13`, `issn-12`, `otro`]"}
          schema={{"title":"UniversalIdType","enum":["ean-8","upc-12","upc-8","gtin-14","isbn-13","issn-12","otro"],"type":"string","description":"tipo de identificador universal usado","x-enum-elements":[{"name":"ean8","description":""},{"name":"upc12","description":""},{"name":"upc8","description":""},{"name":"gtin14","description":""},{"name":"isbn13","description":""},{"name":"issn12","description":""},{"name":"otro","description":""}]}}
        >

          schema={{"type":"string","description":"nombre del color","nullable":true,"example":"blanco"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"size"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"talla, puede ser una cadena arbitraria","nullable":true,"example":"XL"}}
        >

          collapsible={false}
          name={"stock"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
